mean_en: to bring or get something back, especially from a place where it should not be;  to find and get back data or information that has been stored in the memory of a computer; to make a bad situation better; to get back something that was lost
sentence: I went back to the theater to retrieve my umbrella that I left there.
sentence_trans: 我回到电影院取回了之前落在那儿的伞。
